title: 'Broken seats, overhead bin held together with duct tape': Passenger recounts harrowing experience on PIA flight
content: A PIA passenger recounted his treacherous flight to Skardu, describing the journey as fraught with unexpected challenges due to the airline's troubled state. He faced issues such as a broken seat handle and overhead bin held together with duct tape, all while flying through dangerous mountain ranges. Despite his concerns, he was captivated by Skardu's stunning scenery.
summary: A PIA passenger recounted his treacherous flight to Skardu, describing the journey as fraught with unexpected challenges due to the airline's troubled state. He faced issues such as a broken seat handle and overhead bin held together with duct tape, all while flying through dangerous mountain ranges. Despite his concerns, he was captivated by Skardu's stunning scenery.

title: Harry and Meghan’s pact: Why children Archie and Lilibet won’t star in upcoming Netflix shows
content: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle had differing views on their children's public exposure, with Meghan initially agreeing to feature them in a Netflix show. However, Harry's preference to shield their children has prevailed, and Archie and Lilibet will be out of the limelight. Meghan also chose a different filming location for her cooking show to protect her family's privacy.
summary: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle had differing views on their children's public exposure, with Meghan initially agreeing to feature them in a Netflix show. However, Harry's preference to shield their children has prevailed, and Archie and Lilibet will be out of the limelight. Meghan also chose a different filming location for her cooking show to protect her family's privacy.

title: Trump assassination attempt: Multiple Secret service agents placed on leave amid ongoing probe
content: Following an assassination attempt on Donald Trump, the Secret Service put at least five agents on leave, including the head of the Pittsburgh field office. The shooter, Thomas Matthew Crooks, managed to fire multiple shots, causing casualties and injuring Trump. The incident led to the resignation of Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle soon after.
summary: Following an assassination attempt on Donald Trump, the Secret Service put at least five agents on leave, including the head of the Pittsburgh field office. The shooter, Thomas Matthew Crooks, managed to fire multiple shots, causing casualties and injuring Trump. The incident led to the resignation of Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle soon after.

title: 'Like Steak or Spaghetti': Trump's old interview on homosexuality goes viral
content: An old interview with Donald Trump from Late Night with Conan O'Brien has resurfaced online. In the 2004 interview, Trump asked a contestant about his sexuality and later compared choosing a partner to selecting a meal from a menu. The comment has sparked debates on social media, especially given Trump's complex stance on LGBTQ rights.
summary: An old interview with Donald Trump from Late Night with Conan O'Brien has resurfaced online. In the 2004 interview, Trump asked a contestant about his sexuality and later compared choosing a partner to selecting a meal from a menu. The comment has sparked debates on social media, especially given Trump's complex stance on LGBTQ rights.

title: 'What real love looks like': Michelle Obama lauds Gus Walz’s emotional DNC reaction, slams online bullies
content: Michelle Obama praised Gus Walz, son of vice president candidate Tim Walz, for his heartfelt reaction at the Democratic National Convention. Obama denounced the bullying Gus faced after Ann Coulter called him 'weird.' Gus, diagnosed with nonverbal learning disorder and anxiety, stood out for his emotional pride when his dad took the stage.
summary: Michelle Obama praised Gus Walz, son of vice president candidate Tim Walz, for his heartfelt reaction at the Democratic National Convention. Obama denounced the bullying Gus faced after Ann Coulter called him 'weird.' Gus, diagnosed with nonverbal learning disorder and anxiety, stood out for his emotional pride when his dad took the stage.

title: Who is Ann Coulter, Conservative commentator who sparked political storm after 'weird' comment on Gus Walz
content: Ann Coulter sparked controversy with a now-deleted tweet calling Minnesota governor Tim Walz's son 'weird' after he emotionally supported his father at the Democratic National Convention. The backlash was swift, prompting Coulter to remove the post, citing his autism diagnosis. Coulter is known for her bold, often controversial conservative commentary and books supporting Donald Trump.
summary: Ann Coulter sparked controversy with a now-deleted tweet calling Minnesota governor Tim Walz's son 'weird' after he emotionally supported his father at the Democratic National Convention. The backlash was swift, prompting Coulter to remove the post, citing his autism diagnosis. Coulter is known for her bold, often controversial conservative commentary and books supporting Donald Trump.

title: Asserting her patriotic credentials, Kamala paints Trump as un-American
content: "Just imagine Donald Trump with no guardrails, and how he would use the immense powers of the presidency of the United States. Not to improve your life, not to strengthen our national security, but to serve the only client he has ever had: himself," she warned while presenting her self as a prosecutor who has only had one client her entire career: the people.
summary: "Just imagine Donald Trump with no guardrails, and how he would use the immense powers of the presidency of the United States. Not to improve your life, not to strengthen our national security, but to serve the only client he has ever had: himself," she warned while presenting her self as a prosecutor who has only had one client her entire career: the people.

title: Type 2 Polio virus paralyses baby in Gaza, UN calls for immediate vaccination campaign
content: A 10-month-old baby in Gaza was paralysed by type 2 polio, the first occurrence in 25 years, reported the World Health Organisation (WHO). The case has prompted urgent calls for a vaccination campaign amidst Gaza's war-damaged health infrastructure. Israel and Hamas have agreed to support vaccination efforts to mitigate the outbreak among the vulnerable population.
summary: A 10-month-old baby in Gaza was paralysed by type 2 polio, the first occurrence in 25 years, reported the World Health Organisation (WHO). The case has prompted urgent calls for a vaccination campaign amidst Gaza's war-damaged health infrastructure. Israel and Hamas have agreed to support vaccination efforts to mitigate the outbreak among the vulnerable population.

title: Thailand postpones BIMSTEC summit until after new government formed, foreign ministry says
content: Thailand has postponed hosting the BIMSTEC summit originally scheduled for September 3-4 until a new administration is formed. The delay follows the court's dismissal of the previous premier, with the successor yet to name her cabinet. The BIMSTEC involves leaders from seven South Asian nations, including Thailand, India, and Myanmar, who meet biennially.
summary: Thailand has postponed hosting the BIMSTEC summit originally scheduled for September 3-4 until a new administration is formed. The delay follows the court's dismissal of the previous premier, with the successor yet to name her cabinet. The BIMSTEC involves leaders from seven South Asian nations, including Thailand, India, and Myanmar, who meet biennially.

title: Israelis in Cairo for Gaza talks but disputes linger
content: Israeli negotiators are in Cairo to discuss a Gaza truce amid ongoing conflict. Disputes remain over the presence of Israeli troops on Gaza's southern border. The negotiations, supported by Egypt, Qatar, and the US, aim to end the war between Israel and Hamas, triggered by an unprecedented Hamas attack. The UN reports mass displacement and dire humanitarian conditions in Gaza.
summary: Israeli negotiators are in Cairo to discuss a Gaza truce amid ongoing conflict. Disputes remain over the presence of Israeli troops on Gaza's southern border. The negotiations, supported by Egypt, Qatar, and the US, aim to end the war between Israel and Hamas, triggered by an unprecedented Hamas attack. The UN reports mass displacement and dire humanitarian conditions in Gaza.

title: ‘Thrown like a baseball pitch’: Woman knocked to the ground by flying Hulk Hogan’s beer can. Some say he threw it
content: A woman in Ohio was hurt when a beer can struck her during a promotional event for Hulk Hogan's Real American Beer at Thirsty Cowboy in Medina Township. There's confusion over whether Hogan or a crew member threw the can. She received nine stitches. Medina Township police investigated, but no arrests were made.
summary: A woman in Ohio was hurt when a beer can struck her during a promotional event for Hulk Hogan's Real American Beer at Thirsty Cowboy in Medina Township. There's confusion over whether Hogan or a crew member threw the can. She received nine stitches. Medina Township police investigated, but no arrests were made.

title: Indian woman rescued after falling into 8-meter sinkhole in Kuala Lumpur
'F**ked Up Beyond All Recognition': New York Rep Pat Ryan uses army slang for Trump
content: Pat Ryan, New York Representative and veteran, called Donald Trump 'FUBAR' during his speech at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago. Ryan, elected to Congress in 2022, focused on his military service and veteran affairs. He launched a program to assist veterans in his district with obtaining government benefits and services.
summary: Pat Ryan, New York Representative and veteran, called Donald Trump 'FUBAR' during his speech at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago. Ryan, elected to Congress in 2022, focused on his military service and veteran affairs. He launched a program to assist veterans in his district with obtaining government benefits and services.

title: Photo of Kamala Harris’ great-niece Amara watching historic moment at DNC breaks the internet: 'THIS is the picture that goes into history books'
content: A stirring photograph of Kamala Harris’ great-niece, Amara Ajagu, intently watching her aunt accept the Democratic nomination, has gone viral. Captured by Todd Heisler, the image has been lauded for its emotional resonance and met with mixed reactions online. Amara, already expressing strong social values, adds a personal touch to Harris' campaign.
summary: A stirring photograph of Kamala Harris’ great-niece, Amara Ajagu, intently watching her aunt accept the Democratic nomination, has gone viral. Captured by Todd Heisler, the image has been lauded for its emotional resonance and met with mixed reactions online. Amara, already expressing strong social values, adds a personal touch to Harris' campaign.

title: Neither Beyonce nor Taylor Swift, this was the 'special guest' at end of DNC
content: The Democratic National Convention ended amid much anticipation for rumored performances by pop icons like Beyonce and Taylor Swift. Although artists like Pink and John Legend did perform, Beyonce and Swift did not make surprise appearances. Kamala Harris' speech highlighted the event, with organizers stating no celebrity performances were planned to maintain electoral focus.
summary: The Democratic National Convention ended amid much anticipation for rumored performances by pop icons like Beyonce and Taylor Swift. Although artists like Pink and John Legend did perform, Beyonce and Swift did not make surprise appearances. Kamala Harris' speech highlighted the event, with organizers stating no celebrity performances were planned to maintain electoral focus.

title: Tim Walz under fire after viral video captures him aggressively pulling son Gus on DNC stage: 'Shows his true colors'
content: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz faced mixed reactions after a video showed him pulling his son Gus onto the stage at the Democratic National Convention. Initially praised for their emotional display, the gesture is now seen by some as aggressive. The controversy comes during a crucial time for Walz's campaign with Kamala Harris.
summary: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz faced mixed reactions after a video showed him pulling his son Gus onto the stage at the Democratic National Convention. Initially praised for their emotional display, the gesture is now seen by some as aggressive. The controversy comes during a crucial time for Walz's campaign with Kamala Harris.

title: JD Vance walks into donut shop and no one cares, VP candidate roasted over 'awkward' and 'cringe-worthy' moment: Watch
content: During a campaign stop at Holt's Sweet Shop in Valdosta, Georgia, vice presidential candidate JD Vance faced an awkward situation when an employee requested not to be filmed. The cringe-worthy encounter went viral on social media. Vance, whose attempts at casual interaction fell flat, later addressed local issues and criticized the Democrats’ immigration policies during his rally.
summary: During a campaign stop at Holt's Sweet Shop in Valdosta, Georgia, vice presidential candidate JD Vance faced an awkward situation when an employee requested not to be filmed. The cringe-worthy encounter went viral on social media. Vance, whose attempts at casual interaction fell flat, later addressed local issues and criticized the Democrats’ immigration policies during his rally.

title: 'Tyrants are laughing at her': What Donald Trump said about Kamala Harris' DNC speech
content: Donald Trump criticized Kamala Harris's speech at the Democratic National Convention, where she accepted the Democratic presidential nomination. Harris discussed her stance on Ukraine, NATO, and immigration. Trump condemned her viewpoints and actions on these issues, labeling her a radical and accusing her of failing on border security and international relations.
summary: Donald Trump criticized Kamala Harris's speech at the Democratic National Convention, where she accepted the Democratic presidential nomination. Harris discussed her stance on Ukraine, NATO, and immigration. Trump condemned her viewpoints and actions on these issues, labeling her a radical and accusing her of failing on border security and international relations.

title: Tourists trample Angkor Wat mimicking Temple Run game for TikTok hits
content: Visitors are replicating the Temple Run video game at Cambodia’s Angkor Wat, sparking concerns among conservationists about potential damage to the 900-year-old site. The trend has gained significant online traction, but experts stress the importance of balancing tourism, sustainability, and cultural respect. Discussions are ongoing about how best to manage and preserve historic site.
summary: Visitors are replicating the Temple Run video game at Cambodia’s Angkor Wat, sparking concerns among conservationists about potential damage to the 900-year-old site. The trend has gained significant online traction, but experts stress the importance of balancing tourism, sustainability, and cultural respect. Discussions are ongoing about how best to manage and preserve  historic site.

title: Kamala Harris tears into Trump at DNC speech: 'Unserious man, but consequences of his return to White House extremely serious'
content: Kamala Harris accepted the Democratic nomination for president, using her speech at the convention to criticize Donald Trump and outline her vision for the future. She highlighted the dangers of a Trump re-election, citing his attempts to overturn the 2020 results and legal troubles. Harris promised to prioritize unity and core American values, energizing the audience for the upcoming election.
summary: Kamala Harris accepted the Democratic nomination for president, using her speech at the convention to criticize Donald Trump and outline her vision for the future. She highlighted the dangers of a Trump re-election, citing his attempts to overturn the 2020 results and legal troubles. Harris promised to prioritize unity and core American values, energizing the audience for the upcoming election.
